WorkItem.Description:
Im at the part where you have justed modifed the Scaffolded View after creating the StoreManagerController.

I click edit and get " Microsoft JScript runtime error: 'jQuery' is undefined "
Details works fine but edit gives me that error

Ideas? as far as I know I haven't changed any JavaScript and I've only copy pasted code from the tutorial

Edit: Creating gives the same error too
WorkItem.Summary: Microsoft JScript runtime error: 'jQuery' is undefined after clicking on edit in the StoreManager

Comments.Message: I believe this is caused by an incorrectly registered version of jQuery (in _Layout.cshtml).  There are three places (I believe) where jQuery version "1.4.4" is shown, but the correct version that is included in the project is "1.5.1".  Just change the version # and the issue should go away.
